verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vai-Ye-red went down שִׁמְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon And Samson תִּמְנָ֑תָה <S%H8553><s%> tim-Na-tah; to Timnath וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar and saw אִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a woman בְּתִמְנָ֖תָה <S%H8553><s%> be-tim-Na-tah in Timnath מִבְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> mib-be-Not of the daughters פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim. of the Philistines

וַיַּ֗עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al, And he came up וַיַּגֵּד֙ <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Ged and told לְאָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> le-'a-Viv his father וּלְאִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> u-le-'im-Mo, and his mother וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, and said אִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a woman רָאִ֥יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti I have seen בְתִמְנָ֖תָה <S%H8553><s%> ve-tim-Na-tah in Timnath מִבְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> mib-be-Not of the daughters פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim; of the Philistines וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now קְחוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> ke-chu- now therefore get אוֹתָ֥הּ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah לִּ֖י li לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah. her for me to wife

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said ל֜וֹ lo אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv Then his father וְאִמּ֗וֹ <S%H517><s%> ve-'im-Mo, and his mother הַאֵין֩ <S%H369><s%> ha-'Ein unto him [Is there] never בִּבְנ֨וֹת <S%H1323><s%> biv-Not among the daughters אַחֶ֤יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-cha of thy brethren וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi or among all my people אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah, a woman כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you הוֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> ho-leCh that thou goest לָקַ֣חַת <S%H3947><s%> la-Ka-chat to take אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah, a wife מִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> mip-pe-lish-Tim Philistine הָעֲרֵלִ֑ים <S%H6189><s%> ha-'a-re-Lim; of the uncircumcised וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said שִׁמְשׁ֤וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon Samson אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his אָבִיו֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv unto his father אוֹתָ֣הּ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah קַֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> kach- Get לִ֔י Li, כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he יָשְׁרָ֥ה <S%H3474><s%> ya-she-Rah good בְעֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Nai. affliction

וְאָבִ֨יו <S%H1><s%> ve-'a-Viv But his father וְאִמּ֜וֹ <S%H517><s%> ve-'im-Mo and his mother לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not יָדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'U, knew כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki that it was מֵיְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh not that it [was] of the LORD הִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> Hi, he כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for תֹאֲנָ֥ה <S%H8385><s%> to-'a-Nah an occasion הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- He מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Kesh that he sought מִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> mip-pe-lish-Tim; against the Philistines וּבָעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> u-va-'Et for at that time הַהִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi, he פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim the Philistines מֹשְׁלִ֥ים <S%H4910><s%> mo-she-Lim had dominion בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El. over Israel פ Peh

וַיֵּ֧רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vai-Ye-red down שִׁמְשׁ֛וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon Samson וְאָבִ֥יו <S%H1><s%> ve-'a-Viv and his father וְאִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> ve-'im-Mo and his mother תִּמְנָ֑תָה <S%H8553><s%> tim-Na-tah; to Timnath וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far כַּרְמֵ֣י <S%H3754><s%> kar-Mei to the vineyards תִמְנָ֔תָה <S%H8553><s%> tim-Na-tah, of Timnath וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold כְּפִ֣יר <S%H3715><s%> ke-Fir and behold a young אֲרָי֔וֹת <S%H738><s%> a-ra-Yot, lion שֹׁאֵ֖ג <S%H7580><s%> sho-'Eg roared לִקְרָאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-To. against

וַתִּצְלַ֨ח <S%H6743><s%> vat-titz-Lach came mightily עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach And the Spirit יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD וַֽיְשַׁסְּעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H8156><s%> vay-shas-se-'E-hu upon him and he rent כְּשַׁסַּ֣ע <S%H8156><s%> ke-shas-Sa' him as he would have rent הַגְּדִ֔י <S%H1423><s%> hag-ge-Di, a kid וּמְא֖וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> u-me-'U-mah and [he had] nothing אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein had בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do; in his hand וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not הִגִּיד֙ <S%H5046><s%> hig-Gid but he told לְאָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> le-'a-Viv not his father וּלְאִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> u-le-'im-Mo, or his mother אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah. what he had done

וַיֵּ֖רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vai-Ye-red And he went down וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber and talked לָאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> la-'ish-Shah; with the woman וַתִּישַׁ֖ר <S%H3474><s%> vat-ti-Shar good בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei affliction שִׁמְשֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon. Samson

וַיָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov he returned מִיָּמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> mi-ya-Mim And after a time לְקַחְתָּ֔הּ <S%H3947><s%> le-kach-Tah, to take וַיָּ֣סַר <S%H5493><s%> vai-Ya-sar her and he turned aside לִרְא֔וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot, to see אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et מַפֶּ֣לֶת <S%H4658><s%> map-Pe-let the carcase הָאַרְיֵ֑ה <S%H738><s%> ha-'ar-Yeh; of the lion וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold עֲדַ֧ת <S%H5712><s%> 'a-Dat and behold [there was] a swarm דְּבוֹרִ֛ים <S%H1682><s%> de-vo-Rim of bees בִּגְוִיַּ֥ת <S%H1472><s%> big-vi-Yat in the carcase הָאַרְיֵ֖ה <S%H738><s%> ha-'ar-Yeh of the lion וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash. and honey

וַיִּרְדֵּ֣הוּ <S%H7287><s%> vai-yir-De-hu And he took אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about כַּפָּ֗יו <S%H3709><s%> kap-Pav, thereof in his hands וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech and came הָלוֹךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> ha-loCh went וְאָכֹ֔ל <S%H398><s%> ve-'a-Chol, eating וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv to his father וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo, and mother וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten and he gave לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem וַיֹּאכֵ֑לוּ <S%H398><s%> vai-yo-Che-lu; them and they did eat וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- did not הִגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> hig-Gid but he told לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki out מִגְּוִיַּ֥ת <S%H1472><s%> mig-ge-vi-Yat out of the carcase הָאַרְיֵ֖ה <S%H738><s%> ha-'ar-Yeh of the lion רָדָ֥ה <S%H7287><s%> ra-Dah not them that he had taken הַדְּבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> had-de-Vash. the honey

וַיֵּ֥רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vai-Ye-red went down אָבִ֖יהוּ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-hu So his father אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah; unto the woman וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as made שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H8123><s%> shim-shOn and Samson מִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <S%H4960><s%> mish-Teh, there a feast כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken this יַעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Su to do הַבַּחוּרִֽים׃ <S%H970><s%> hab-ba-chu-Rim. for so used the young men

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כִּרְאוֹתָ֣ם <S%H7200><s%> kir-'o-Tam And it came to pass when they saw אוֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To; וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu him that they brought שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim thirty מֵֽרֵעִ֔ים <S%H4828><s%> me-re-'Im, companions וַיִּהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu become אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> it-To. for

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said לָהֶם֙ la-Hem שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon, And Samson אָחֽוּדָה־ <S%H2330><s%> 'a-chu-dah- unto them I will now put forth נָּ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na now לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem חִידָ֑ה <S%H2420><s%> chi-Dah; a riddle אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if הַגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> hag-Ged unto you if ye can certainly תַּגִּידוּ֩ <S%H5046><s%> tag-gi-Du declare אוֹתָ֨הּ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah לִ֜י li שִׁבְעַ֨ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At it me within the seven יְמֵ֤י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei days הַמִּשְׁתֶּה֙ <S%H4960><s%> ham-mish-Teh of the feast וּמְצָאתֶ֔ם <S%H4672><s%> u-me-tza-Tem, and find [it] out וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti then I will give לָכֶם֙ la-Chem שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim you thirty סְדִינִ֔ים <S%H5466><s%> se-di-Nim, sheets וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim and thirty חֲלִפֹ֥ת <S%H2487><s%> cha-li-Fot change בְּגָדִֽים׃ <S%H899><s%> be-ga-Dim. of garments

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תוּכְלוּ֮ <S%H3201><s%> tu-che-Lu But if ye cannot לְהַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> le-hag-Gid declare לִי֒ li וּנְתַתֶּ֨ם <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Tem [it] me then shall ye give אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you לִי֙ li שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim me thirty סְדִינִ֔ים <S%H5466><s%> se-di-Nim, sheets וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim and thirty חֲלִיפ֣וֹת <S%H2487><s%> cha-li-Fot change בְּגָדִ֑ים <S%H899><s%> be-ga-Dim; of garments וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-ru And they said ל֔וֹ lo, ח֥וּדָה <S%H2330><s%> Chu-dah unto him Put forth חִידָתְךָ֖ <S%H2420><s%> chi-da-te-Cha thy riddle וְנִשְׁמָעֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H8085><s%> ve-nish-ma-'En-nah. that we may hear

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said לָהֶ֗ם la-Hem, מֵהָֽאֹכֵל֙ <S%H398><s%> me-ha-'o-Chel unto them Out of the eater יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> ya-Tza came forth מַאֲכָ֔ל <S%H3978><s%> ma-'a-Chal, meat וּמֵעַ֖ז <S%H5794><s%> u-me-'Az and out of the strong יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> ya-Tza came forth מָת֑וֹק <S%H4966><s%> ma-Tok; sweetness וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יָכְל֛וּ <S%H3201><s%> ya-che-Lu And they could לְהַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> le-hag-Gid expound הַחִידָ֖ה <S%H2420><s%> ha-chi-Dah the riddle שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet not in three יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim. days

וַיְהִ֣י׀ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I, And it came to pass on the seventh וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru that they said לְאֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> le-'e-shet- wife שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H8123><s%> shim-shOn unto Samson's פַּתִּ֣י <S%H6601><s%> pat-Ti Entice אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אִישֵׁ֗ךְ <S%H376><s%> 'i-Shech, thy husband וְיַגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> ve-yag-ged- that he may declare לָ֙נוּ֙ la-nu אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַ֣חִידָ֔ה <S%H2420><s%> ha-chi-Dah, unto us the riddle פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- or נִשְׂרֹ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> nis-Rof lest we burn אוֹתָ֛ךְ <S%H853><s%> o-Tach וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house אָבִ֖יךְ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vich thee and thy father's בָּאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh; with fire הַלְיָרְשֵׁ֕נוּ <S%H3423><s%> hal-ya-re-She-nu us to take that we have קְרָאתֶ֥ם <S%H7121><s%> ke-ra-Tem have ye called לָ֖נוּ La-nu הֲלֹֽא׃ <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo. not
